QuestData.Title: Jars for Jandvik
QuestData.Description: Last time we met, $r, I was in a cage. You risked your life once before for my kin. Are you willing to aid me once again?$B$BThe serpents' attack has left many of us wounded. I require mending waters to perform my healing rituals.$B$BI have seen the serpents use this water. Return any that you find to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve 6 Mending Water from the Sashj'tar Ruins.
